Container.Name: All The Mods 10
Container.Overview: [b]All the Mods 10-4.0[/b][br]Shaders, Quests, Neoforge: 21.1.8 and tons of mods/fun.[br]Version tags available:[br] - v4.0[br] [br][br][br]Setup:[br][li]You must accept the EULA by setting the [b]EULA[/b] variable to [span style='color: #00E800;']true[/span] or the install will fail.[br]Optional:[br][li]You can setup a comma separated list of players who will have admin privileges in game by setting [b]OPS[/b]

Config.Name: Installed Location
Config.Description: Path to store the installed server files.

Config.Name: EULA
Config.Description: Do you agree to the Mojang EULA available at https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula? Server will not start without accepting. Set to 'true' to accept.

Config.Name: OPS
Config.Description: Comma separated list of players to have op capability
